name: Old Ruins
description:
Old Ruins is an exploration experience where you arrive by boat at a desert with only one goal: get to the large relic buried in the abandoned ruins atop the hill.  Find strange devices to make your way through the harsh atmosphere, while avoiding those who'd try to stop you.

Controls:

WASD-movement
Space- Jump
Mouse-Sight/aiming
E- Interact
Q- Shoot
Alt f4- to exit the game
